TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImportCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of all [Import](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bfecaf1-69fd-4008-b651-c9dafd4389d9) elements in a project.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddNewImport (string projectFile, string condition);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddNewImport(string projectFile, string condition) cil managed

Docs.param: A required string representing the name of the project file for the <Import> statement to be added. For example, "myproject.csproj."
An optional string indicating whether the element is processed. If condition is , then the specified <Import> tag is added, if , it is not.
Docs.summary: Allows hosts to programmatically add a new [<Import>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bfecaf1-69fd-4008-b651-c9dafd4389d9) tag to a project file being manipulated by the host.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Import[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Import[] array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The one-dimensional of objects that is the destination of the elements copied from . The must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
Docs.summary: Copies the entire to a compatible one-dimensional of objects, starting at the specified index of the target array.

Docs.param: The one-dimensional that is the destination of the elements copied from . The must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
Docs.summary: Copies the entire to a compatible one-dimensional , starting at the specified index of the target array.
Gets a value indicating the number of objects in the .
Docs.value: An integer value representing the number of objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Each <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Import> object in the collection represents a element in the project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Import> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ImportCollection>.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).
Docs.value: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, . The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveImport(class Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Import importToRemove) cil managed

Docs.param: A string representing the name of the <Import> tag to remove from the project file.
Docs.summary: Allows hosts to programmatically remove [<Import>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bfecaf1-69fd-4008-b651-c9dafd4389d9) tags that are part of a project file being manipulated by the host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Removing an import marks the project as dirty, which means that the project will be re-evaluated at some point during other operations on the project instance.

Docs.summary: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .
Docs.value: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .
